Non-binary, genderfaunet/trans masc. I am a bad writer qualified only to write fanfiction https://archiveofourown.org/users/mamday #searchable #tootfinder #they/them
Academic, general weeb, occassional human. Over 18. Expect a good amount of faffery in here. They/he/it pronouns (unless I need something different for the punchline).
